Function reference

Low MOI functions

run_sceptre_lowmoi()
Run sceptre on low MOI data
compute_cell_covariates()
Compute cell covariates
generate_all_pairs()
Generate all pairs
plot_calibration_result()
Plot calibration result
compare_calibration_and_discovery_results()
Compare calibration and discovery results
make_volcano_plot()
Make volcano plot
obtain_discovery_set()
Obtain discovery set

Low MOI example data

covariate_data_frame_lowmoi
Covariate data frame
response_matrix_lowmoi
Response expression matrix
grna_group_data_frame_lowmoi
gRNA group data frame
grna_matrix_lowmoi
gRNA expression matrix
lowmoi_data
sceptre package example low MOI data

High MOI functions

run_sceptre_highmoi()
Run sceptre on high MOI data
threshold_gRNA_matrix()
Threshold gRNA count matrix
combine_perturbations()
Combine perturbations
make_qq_plot()
Make QQ-plot

gRNA_matrix_highmoi
gRNA expression matrix

Covariate matrix

gRNA groups table

Gene-gRNA group pairs
